participant_1.background:
I am generous with my family and friends.
i have two sons that i am raising by myself.
i take things very literally.
I moved to Los Angeles from Tokyo and my brothers helped me a lot, so I am making lunch for them to show my appreciation.
I joined a ski club and met a great group of friends.

participant_2.background:
I'm a bit of a loner, but I love spending time with my family on special occasions.
My parents died when I was young, so my sister and I had to take care of each other.
i have traveled to europe and mexico.
I'm the son of lawyers and I can make fart noises with my armpits.
I need to figure out how to satisfy my hunger and continue teaching my students.

content.text: Hi there! What is your name?
Hello, my name is Michael!
Nice to meet you Michael! My name is Aiko.
It's nice to meet you too, Aiko! What are you up to today?
I'm making lunch for my brothers because they helped me a lot when I moved to Los Angeles from Tokyo.
That's really nice of you, Aiko! I'm sure they appreciate it.
I hope so! They are the best. What about you, Michael? What are you up to today?
I'm working on some lesson plans for my students. I'm a teacher.
That's really cool! I've always wanted to be a teacher.
It's a lot of work, but it's also very rewarding.
I'm sure it is! I'm sure your students love you.
I hope so! They're a great group of kids.
That's good to hear!
It is! So, what do you like to do for fun?
I like to ski, go to the beach, and spend time with my family.
Those all sound like fun activities! I love to travel. I've been to Europe and Mexico.
That's awesome! I've always wanted to travel to Europe.
It's a beautiful place. You should definitely go sometime.
I will! Thanks for the recommendation, Michael!
No problem, Aiko
